pull.title: test: Add shrinkdebugfile=0 to regtest bitcoin.conf
pull.body:
This helps avoid accidentally truncating the debug.log while manually
debugging.

events.message:
[qa] Add shrinkdebugfile=0 to regtest bitcoin.conf

This helps avoid accidentally truncating the debug.log while manually
debugging.

events.body: ACK, seems the right thing to do unless the goal is to test the debug file shrinking.

> ACK, seems the right thing to do unless the goal is to test the debug file shrinking.

conf values can be overwritten by command line values, so it should still be testable

rename.to: test: Add shrinkdebugfile=0 to regtest bitcoin.conf

issue.title: Bitcoin PR tracking
issue.body: The main purpose of this issue is to keep track of Pull Requests on Bitcoin since version 0.19.1 identifying those which make a porting LitecoinZ.
